name: Devil Garden
description:
In this visual novel-esque game, follow Lilin the demoness as she inherits a kingdom and starts her journey of conquest with...vegetables???

CONTROLS: It's all the mouse! CLICK STUFF!

(It's a bit rushed. It uses slightly-manipulated public domain art from OpenGameArt.org. There may be bugs. I'll be checking it over in the coming days and possibly even adding more features. But you should get the idea of what I'm going for!)

Based (loosely) on Josh Grilli's "Devil Garden" submission to Famicase 17. (I manipulated his artwork to create the Lilin sprite. I hope he's not upset about that.)
